messages.content: Welcome back! Here's what has been happening since you were last here:

actions.title: Moderation response times increasing
actions.description: Average response time has increased to 4.2 hours (up 35% from last week).

actions.title: @timec posting suspicious links
actions.description: User has posted 8 external links in the past hour across #general and #help channels. Community members are reporting spam.

actions.title: Engagement spike in #feature-requests
actions.description: Discussion about dark mode has generated 47 replies and 23 upvotes. Sarah Chen and Mike Rodriguez are leading productive conversations.

message.content: Learn more about the moderation response times

messages.content: Your moderation response times are increasing due to a higher volume of reports and limited moderator availability during peak hours
I recommend adding a new moderator. Let me find the best candidates for you.

message.content: Assign Discord role to Alex Thompson

props.message: I've assigned the Discord role to Sarah Chen. Shall I send an announcement to the community?

message.content: Assign Discord role to Sarah Chen

messages.content: I can see you have an upcoming meeting with your manager, Leo Tan.

messages.content: I've just sent a community health report to Leo ahead of the meeting.

message.content: Yes, I'm going to send a community health report to my manager

messages.content: Also, Feature X is being discussed a lot in the community lately. There's been a 40% increase in mentions and the sentiment is overwhelmingly positive. Maybe it's time to do a Twitter Spaces to dive deeper into this topic?
